/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses are parked along the sides of the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows on the ground and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
